channel.title: Need help with autovote read:
channel.description: Hello, can anyone help me with making autovote im using 317 source . Please add me skype: areyou.mad

item.title: Need help with autovote read:
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

What do you need help with, not just “making the system” it isn’t our job to make it for you.

Here are some ‘requirements’ for a auto vote system:

[ol][li]Website that allows FTP (For your custom vote page)[/li]
[li]Website with MySQL, and Remote MySQL. See here for details[/li]
[li]A brain[/li]
[li]Your RSPS needs to be on a server (or computer, vps, etc) with port 3306 open (idk if you need it, but I always opened it just in case, it’s the port for MySQL)[/li][/ol]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with autovote read:

item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Good luck with your issue.
